texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.DisplayName:Title: Title
texts.EventHub:OrganizationNameAlreadyExists: The organization {Name} already exists. Please use another name.
texts.EventHub:NotAuthorizedToCreateEventInThi: You are not authorized to create events for the organization {OrganizationName}.
texts.EventHub:EventEndTimeCantBeEarlierThanSt: Event end time can not be earlier than the start time.
texts.EventHub:CantRegisterOrUnregisterForAPas: Can not register to or unregister from an event in the past.
texts.EventRegisterSuccessMessage: We will send a reminder email before the event.
texts.EventRegistrationCancelledMessage: Your event registration has been cancelled.
texts.NoEventOrganizedByThisOrganizationYet: No event organized by this organization yet!
texts.NewEventYouHaveNoOrganizationYetMessage: You have to create an organization first!
texts.EventHub:NotAuthorizedToUpdateOrganizati: You are not authorized to update the "{OrganizationName}" organization.
texts.AttendeesCanSeeEventLocation: Only attendees can see the event's {0}.
texts.LocationHasNotSpecifiedYet: Event {0} has not been specified yet.
